verbs.description: [ARG0: This year 's Al - Quds Day event] [V: saw] [ARG1: the usual burning of flags and chants of ' Death to America ' and ' Death to Israel ' , as well as a huge Donald Trump figure being hanged from a crane] .
This year 's Al - Quds Day event saw the usual burning of flags and chants of ' Death to America ' and ' Death to Israel ' , as well as a huge Donald Trump figure [V: being] hanged from a crane .
